definitions.definition: A plant or flower of the genus Viola , especially the fragrant Viola odorata ; ( inexact ) similar - looking plants and flowers .
A person thought to resemble V. odorata , especially in its beauty and delicacy .
The color of most violets; the colour evoked by the shortest visible wavelengths between 380 and 435 nm, an additive tertiary colour.
Clothes and ( ecclesiastical ) vestments of such a colour .
The characteristic scent of V. odorata .

main_definition: A plant or flower of the genus Viola , especially the fragrant Viola odorata ; ( inexact ) similar - looking plants and flowers .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) A person thought to resemble V. odorata , especially in its beauty and delicacy .
The color of most violets; the colour evoked by the shortest visible wavelengths between 380 and 435 nm, an additive tertiary colour.
Clothes and ( ecclesiastical ) vestments of such a colour .
( perfumes ) The characteristic scent of V. odorata .
( UK dialect ) Synonym of onion ( “ vegetable ” ) .
